prs.taskTitle: Enable connection to parent User Story
prs.title: Enable connection to parent User Story
prs.body:
Title: Enable connection to parent User Story

As a: project manager
I want: to connect user stories to different parent stories
So that: I can reorganize story hierarchies and link stories to other branches or root

Description: Allow user stories to connect to different parent stories, enabling flexible hierarchy management across branches or root level

Components: WorkModel

Story Points: 5

Acceptance Tests:
1. Verify root level connection
   Given: I have a child story
   When: I remove the parent connection or set it to root
   Then: the story becomes a root-level story in the hierarchy
2. Verify parent story selection
   Given: I am editing a user story
   When: I select a different parent story from the available options
   Then: the story is successfully linked to the new parent and hierarchy is updated

prs.taskTitle: Filter User Stories in Mindmap View
prs.title: Filter User Stories in Mindmap View
prs.body:
Title: Filter User Stories in Mindmap View

As a: project manager
I want: to filter user stories by status, component, and assignee
So that: I can focus on specific subsets of stories and reduce visual clutter in the mindmap

Description: Add a filter button to the top toolbar that opens a modal allowing users to select filter criteria (status, component, assignee) to narrow down visible user stories in the mindmap view.

Components: WorkModel

Story Points: 5

1. Applying filters updates mindmap visibility

   When: I apply the filters
   Then: only user stories matching the selected criteria are visible in the mindmap view
2. Filter button opens modal with criteria
   Given: I am viewing the mindmap with multiple user stories
   When: I click the filter button in the top toolbar
   Then: a modal opens displaying filter options for status, component, and assignee
